test:
> with 'Many years later as he faced the firing squad, Colonel Aureliano Buendia was to remember that distant afternoon when his father took him to discover ice.' as s select replaceRegexpAll(materialize(s), ' ', '
') as w from numbers(1000000)
> with 'Many years later as he faced the firing squad, Colonel Aureliano Buendia was to remember that distant afternoon when his father took him to discover ice.' as s select replaceRegexpOne(materialize(s), ' ', '
') as w from numbers(1000000)
> with 'Many years later as he faced the firing squad, Colonel Aureliano Buendia was to remember that distant afternoon when his father took him to discover ice.' as s select replaceRegexpAll(materialize(s), '\s+', '\0
') as w from numbers(100000)
> with 'Many years later as he faced the firing squad, Colonel Aureliano Buendia was to remember that distant afternoon when his father took him to discover ice.' as s select replaceRegexpOne(materialize(s), '\s+', '\0
') as w from numbers(100000)
> with 'Many years later as he faced the firing squad, Colonel Aureliano Buendia was to remember that distant afternoon when his father took him to discover ice.' as s select replaceAll(materialize(s), ' ', '
') as w from numbers(1000000)
> with 'Many years later as he faced the firing squad, Colonel Aureliano Buendia was to remember that distant afternoon when his father took him to discover ice.' as s select replaceOne(materialize(s), ' ', '
') as w from numbers(1000000)
